reviews.sentence: Possibly the best we have EVER stayed in. 5 of 5. Easily one of the best if not THE BEST. we have stayed in. 5 of 5 starsWe LOVED this hotel. Had last minute issues during our trip had to change our booking after the cut off. The staff were all SO helpful nice that alone would make us come back but the rest of the hotel was also above beyond. The breakfast buffet was hands down the best we have had in Eurpoe the UK or the US. When we were there they had fresh fruit blueberry pancakes. w real blueberries as well as a selection of cereals breads bagels muffins. Very nice waitstaf who will bring you coffee tea juice real juice not Hi C waterThe room was very nice. Sleep number matreses was quite comfy we had a room on the side so there was no traffic noise. Slept great. The room was modern and clean kureig in our room instead of a coffee machine I call it a bonus most in room coffee is teribleBIG FLUFFY TOWELS. It is SO hard to find hotels with towels that are decent sized and do not feel like sandpaperLoby was spacious business like yet comfortable Breakfast area turns into a bar lounge at night and seemed quite nice Parking garage was under the hotel easy to access felt secure. would not know it was there from the road Good location near a big intersection that is easy to get to get directions to from. Nearby many shops restaurantsLastly it was really well priced not the cheapest but not expensive either. SO worth a little extra.

Nice hotel with free shuttle service. Stayed here for a business trip for 4 nights. The hotel has free shuttle service to my companys office and other locations. so that is very convenient. You do have to pre book the shuttle though. Gym was small but has 2 treadmills. Pool area is nice and was empty when I visited. Only downfall is that my room did not have direct sunlight but only through some sort of airshaft. This made me feel a bit claustrophobic. Otherwise the room was nice and clean. Staff was very friendly. I did not try the breakfast because there is a supermarket in walking distance and a fridge in the room.

Wonderful breakfast and nicely decorated. The Domain Hotel staff are friendly and attentive. The free shuttle to LinkedIn and Google headquarters was extremely helpful during my trip and the driver was a great conversationalist. The breakfast was unbelievably generous and delicious 5stars for the quality and all the choices. The rooms are nice as is the decor however this is an older hotel that is been upgraded as best you can with an older design. Hey if you wait long enough it is back in vogue right. it is very nice and I would stay again but do not expect fancy grounds etc.

Trendy decor free shuttle. Stayed here three nights for a trade show at the Santa Clara Convention Center the free shuttle to and fro was convenient if not timely super traffic at rush hour. The free breakfast was plentiful and with lots of choices. Only complaint is that they ignored my attempts to re use my towels and replaced them each day. you had think they had care about the drought and saving water if not money.
Room is bigmice location. Shower is broken tub is clogged should not be a 3 12 star hotelnothkng special.

A great value in Silicon Valley. A hidden gem in Silicon Valley. Great value for the dollar compared to the other much higher priced hotels. Good central location easy access from all major roads convenient to airport. They have done a good job dressing up an older hotel and making it more modern. It has come a long way from when I started staying there years ago.

Great hotel and location amazing value. This was my first time staying at The Domain and the hotel was great. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The location is ideal for accessing much of the South Bay. The lobby is comfortable and ideal for relaxing or getting down to business. The bar staff were great. Jef new the area well and provided great service. Thanks for making a short stay comfortable. I will absolutely stay here the next time I am in town.
Nice hotel in the Bay Area. The Domain is a comfortable nice hotel in a good location.

Nice Trendy. Great Location. What a great find. This trendy hotel is awesome. Love the decor the vibe and the friendly helpful staff. The close proximity to Levis Stadium is very convenient. There are also great restaurants nearby. Plus easy access to gas stations and the freeway. Great price for such a nice hotel. The complimentary breakfast was great more hearty and more of a variety to choose from than your normal hotel free breakfast. The rating would have been a 5 except for the shower could have been a little better needed more water pressure and a better shower head.

Our favorite in Sunyvale. Always a comfortable stay and very helpful staff. We are repeat customers visiting family for about 4 years now. E mail notices of special deals. Tried the sister hotel Wild Palms but prefer Domain. Location is near family and lots of restaurants.

Perception did not exceed expectations. When we arrived at our room that we were staying at for 3 nights the bathroom had yellowish water that smelled like a porta potty on the floor. We saw it was a leak from the toilet and called the front desk immediately. After waiting 45 minutes in our room that had the worst odor a guy came and spent 20 minutes in the bathroom and then left for tools and did not come back for an hour. Even though we were waiting to get ready for our night our plans were on hold in patience for the bathroom to be fixed. After calling the front desk twice a different guy came to fix our bathroom and he was in there for 2 AND A HALF HOURS. When he left yes the smell was gone but to flush the toilet we had to take the top off and push the lever down inside the top of the toilet. Also our shower head was squirting water from the sides and kept sliding down to where the shower head was upside down shooting water upwards and would not stay in its upright position. ALSO our shower and our sink would not hold hot water for more than 30 seconds. I guess I expected for hotels to check the rooms before they allowed guests to stay in them. I find it unlikely for that room to have been cleaned before we arrived because the fact that there was poop water and a foul smell in the bathroom that went unnoticed is insane. I also found it weird to have the hotel know we were sitting in that room while it smelled and while it was being fixed without any offer to change rooms or wait in the lobby. I liked the balconies could have had a table out there though. Close to the freeway to go to where I wanted to be. Room checks to make sure your guests wo nt have any complaints or things to worry about while they are spending money at your hotel on their vacations.

Delightful Stylish and Clean. I stayed one night at the Domain on business in the San Jose area. By local standards where the usual two options are either hyper expensive luxury or moderate price and sketchy The Domain was a wonderful exception. Priced moderately convenient location near freeway and with a style and attention to detail that is not generally seen at this price point. The place was just nice to walk around in. The main interior is a large open atrium that extends up several floors with a large tiered staircase that takes you up to rooms. The look is somewhat mid century modern with a bit of california beach thrown in. The bed and linens were particularly pleasant. I highly recommend The Domain if you need a relaxing basecamp in the Sunyvale or surrounding area.
Excellent service. Breakfast was really good with lot of options. Water and ice dispenser are closely located on each floor. They provide luggage storage facility as well as extended checkout time.

Sunyvale Hotel With a Great Location. I have stayed in The Domain Hotel twice now about six years apart and I am happy to report that not much has changed in that it is a nice hotel to stay in when you are in Sunyvale for business. It has a great location on El Camino Real close to several restaurants. The rooms are fairly comfortable. A particular perk at this hotel is the free pick up drop off facility to your office in their shuttle provided it is sufficiently near and provided you are OK with the scheduled timings. Alex the shuttle driver is especially courteous helpful and someone to have great conversations with. If you are planning to avail this facility please be courteous to the other guests be on time for your pick up and inform the front desk if you will not be taking the shuttle after having booked it. The breakfast was not included in my plan and I never had any food in the hotel. They have a happy hour every day as well between 5 7 PM I think but once again I never went for it.

Quality Service. Of all the things I enjoyed about the quaint hotel was the service the staff provided from the time I entered to the time I left. If it was n’t for them I ’d have spent at least 60 on Lyft rides had they not told me hey offer a complimentary shuttle in the morning to wherever you ’d like to go in the area. The pool area is quite nice too. Staff service exceedingly pleasant.

Amazing service. I stayed at The Domain for a 2 week business trip for my first time in California. While my room had very thin walls which led to extremely poor sound isolation and the water pressure in the shower was not the best I must say that I had a great experience overall. See the issues I had were more infrastructure related but the amazing customer service delivered makes up for this. First off check in was extremely fast and the front desk and housekeeping staff are considerate and helpful. However the star of the show is the shuttle driver Alex. Alex made my early morning commutes a breeze. I had to travel to multiple campuses for work over the 2 weeks and Alex made the morning commutes seamless. I got to my sites on time and with mini tours of the area on the drive each morning. This level of service you probably will not find anywhere else. Keep up the good work Domain and Alex you are the best.
A Great Place to Stay. Very friendly staff and welcoming staff. The room was clean and well appointed. Bed and pillows comfy. Would return to the locations when in the are again.

Bad service. I had sadly chosen this hotel for the location and the pool however I did not receive any notification from you that could not be used and now we are informed that we must go 3 miles to use the pool we feel very disappointed in their service. I want to complain and I will leave my bad rating in booking.

You get less value. 2 stars mainly for the very low value you get from this Hotel. Rooms need major update. It just feel below par compared to other Hotels in the area I do frequently travel to the area. No free breakfast. and they charge 12 night for parking which is a bit of a stretch for Hotel located on El Camino. I would expect a valet service for that price. For the price there are a dozen other Hotels in the area that offer much higher value.

Not worth the price but great location if you can get a deal. The location was excellent. The lobby was beautiful as well. Room was old AC unit did not work well toilet was clogged on arrival. Wine cooler leaked all over the fridge and cabinet. View was of a wall.

great hotel great staff great value for money. Great facility feels new and very well maintained. Simple but modern decor. Room is roomy very well equipped great bed. They have a small swimming pool and a nice gym. Most importantly a great staff. it is the little things that make the difference like when I needed a battery for my computer mouse at 6 am and they made an effort and got me one. Or when one of my Amazon packages the more valuable one was not initially fount they went out of their way to locate it just to find out that one of the staff kept in in a safer room to keep it safe for me. The pricing is also competitive. I love this hotel and will definitely book it again in the future.
